column3: Latest;Sihanoukville:------ On the morning of August 21
column5: police forces are continuing their search for the suspects who shot a Chinese man at midnight on (*source says) August 19
column6: 2019 at the White House Casino in Sangkat 4.------Authorities said the incident was caused by a group of four men who had been barred by security guards from entering the building. One of the men then fired four shots into the casino.------After the attack
column8: and a Chinese male was sent to hospital for gunshot wounds. ------KBN
